commands.description: List breeds of cats and their IDs, check info or get an image of a random or specified breed, or random gifs of cats.
Flip a specified amount of coins.
List breeds of dogs, or get an image of a random or specified breed.
Get a single or twopart joke from a specified genre.
Get a list of server keywords, add a keyword or remove a keyword. Supported Variables: $NAME$, $NICK$, $ID$, $CHANNEL$, and $GUILD$.
Grabs a Minecraft user's skin file.
Gets information about the supplied Minecraft user.
Change the prefix used on this server.
Get a specified amount of numbers between a specified range.
Roll a specified amount of dice with a specified amount of faces.
commands.usage: <amount of dice (up to 1000, default 1)>d<amount of faces (default 6)>

commands.description: Get the usage of the specified command.
Get an image of a worm on a string, shifted by either a specified or random hue value.
